评论概述: Perfect when out 4 wheeling in the desert
评论详情: XYXIONGMAO Multi Pocket Cargo Pants for Men Japanese High Street Pants Drawstring Cargo Pants for Men Hip Hop Sweatpants review.  These fit very nice. Love all the pockets. Great pants to wear when out 4 wheeling. Nice thick material. Drawstring and elastic combo waistband.  There is a multitude of pockets, perfect for storing essentials while on the go.The cargo pants are a baggy style that offers freedom of movement.  These cargo joggers offer an unrivaled comfort. High quality workmanship ensures excellent quality even after prolonged use.  The vintage workwear pants have unique appearance characteristics, and their versatile and fashionable design is irresistible. The pants have a drawstring design at the waist, which allows you to adjust the tightness according to your preferences. The three-dimensional multi pocket design is very practical and can carry personal items. There is a strap between the legs and the hem, which adds a unique touch and links the legs to the pants.

I ordered this pair of pants becasue of the cargo pockets, loose fit, and the slightly vintage motif. Overall, the fit is nice with loose pant legs, well-support elastic ankles, and big, zippered pockets. The canvas is thinner than typical canvas pants but I think it makes sense because of the sealed legs means the pants need to breath a little easier. Either way, it's light and comfortable. More importantly, my teenage daughters both say this pair looks good when worn--a high praise from teems who rarely show approval for anything I wear.
